title: Please give kindred a new cool skin.
body:
Please Rito, enough Lux, Annie, Ashe, Riven etc skins. Please give us a new Kindred skin. Elderwood, bloodmoon, darkstar, please, let me give you my money!

Thank you for listening.

Helmsa

replies.body: I think a new Kindred skin got leaked recently but it's unconfirmed
